description: We are thinking of training dogs to be able to "sniff out" Ebola to help create early awareness.  Being able to identify Ebola in a patient could help to isolate that person and stop his chances from infecting others. Dogs have been thought to be able to sniff out cancer, or people that are extremely sick. It is an interesting and unique thought and should definitely be looked in to.

title: Training dogs to detect Ebola to decrease the chances of the disease being spread.
